source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot captures a first-person perspective of a long, narrow corridor. The walls, floor, and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, off-white tiles, creating a disorienting grid pattern that recedes into a hazy, indistinct distance. The camera moves steadily forward through the sterile-looking space.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot captures a first-person perspective of a long, narrow corridor. The walls, floor, and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, off-white tiles, creating a disorienting grid pattern that recedes into a hazy, indistinct distance. The camera moves steadily forward through the sterile-looking space.

generated_critique: The caption begins with the introductory phrase "This scenery shot captures," which should be removed. The description also includes the subjective adjectives "disorienting" and "sterile-looking," which should be omitted to maintain objectivity. The caption should be revised to lead with the motion, describing the steady forward movement from a first-person perspective through the tiled corridor that recedes into a hazy distance.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: From a first-person perspective, the camera moves steadily forward through a long, narrow corridor. The walls, floor, and ceiling are uniformly covered in small, off-white tiles, creating a grid pattern that recedes into a hazy, indistinct distance.
